name: In re APPOINTMENT TO THE PENNSYLVANIA COMMISSION ON SENTENCING
name_abbreviation: In re Appointment to the Pennsylvania Commission on Sentencing

parties: In re APPOINTMENT TO THE PENNSYLVANIA COMMISSION ON SENTENCING.

opinions.text:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 30th day of July, 1991, The Honorable John L. Braxton, Philadelphia, is appointed as a member of the Pennsylvania Commission on Sentencing for a term expiring on April 27, 1993.

casebody.head_matter:
593 A.2d 836
In re APPOINTMENT TO THE PENNSYLVANIA COMMISSION ON SENTENCING.
No. 96.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 30, 1991.
